inscription:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: various notes and numbers
medium: Etching, engraving, stipple work, and roulette
provenance: [Hill-Stone Inc. Fine Old Master & Modern Prints & Drawings, New York, until 1985; sold in October for RNTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1985-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [P. P. Prudhon. inv. incidit.]
title: Phrosine et Mélidore
